description: A little bit casual, a whole lot of cozy, the Revel series treats your feet to a new definition of comfortable. The Men’s Revel Chelsea features a felted, polyester upper with gore stretch and a warm fleece lining, this relaxation focused Chelsea meets the intersection of boot and slipper. Chaco’s signature LUVSEAT™ footbed creates a podiatrist certified platform to introduce you to cozy 2.0. Go ahead and kick back.
name: Chaco Revel Chelsea V-Gore - Mens
